name: Zombies Berserk
description:
A Grave Robber was trying to dig up his wife who was killed in a car accident a year ago because she held valuable Documents about state secrets from the U.S Military. But he unmistakably woke up the undead. Can you help him survive and get the secrets back in time before the U.S. Government finds the documents.

Like us on Facebook and Twitter for updates to the development of our game.

Features:

1. Zombies lots of them.
2. Depth of Field
3. Ease of use of Controls.
